settings.name: Kollipara Jaya Deepika
settings.title: PowerBI Dev
settings.summary: An enthusiastic experienced with a strong foundation in computer science, eager to apply skills and contribute to innovative projects.

about.title: About Me
about.content: I am a highly motivated and independent graduate with a passion for technology and a drive to learn. My academic background in Computer Science and Engineering, coupled with hands-on project experience, has equipped me with a solid foundation in software development and problem-solving. I am eager to leverage my skills and contribute to innovative projects in a challenging and dynamic environment. I am always energetic and eager to learn new skills.

items.description: Developed and enhanced Android applications, focusing on troubleshooting complex technical issues and optimizing performance. Achieved a 90% success rate in resolving assigned project issues. Designed and implemented an Advanced Weather Application using the OpenWeather API to provide real-time weather updates.

Participated in a virtual internship focused on cybersecurity, gaining foundational knowledge in cloud security, network security, and security operations. Contributed to understanding and implementing security best practices.

items.title: Weather Tracking App
items.description: Developed a responsive Weather Tracking App using the OpenWeather API, enabling users to track weather conditions for any location with an elegant user interface. Focused on providing accurate and timely weather information.

items.title: SafeDine - Hotel Management System
items.description: Designed and implemented a Hotel Management System that allows restaurants to create food menus accessible via QR codes. Utilized front-end technologies like HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and back-end technologies like SQL and PHP.

items.title: Pneumonia Detection
items.description: Developed a Pneumonia Detection model using Resnet-50 Architecture, trained to identify pneumonia from chest X-ray images with a 95% success rate. Focused on improving diagnostic accuracy and accessibility.

items.degree: B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering
